title: Terraria Wings Tier List
description: Discover the best wings in Terraria with our tier list, ranked from S to C. Learn which wings provide the best flight and utility to help you master the skies in your Terraria adventures.
heading: Terraria Wings Tier List
introText: Discover the best wings in Terraria with our tier list, ranked from S to C. Learn which wings provide the best flight and utility to help you master the skies in your Terraria adventures.

data.itemDescription: Offers the highest flight speed and longest duration, making it the best all-around wings for endgame content
Provides excellent flight stats with near-perfect horizontal movement, ideal for navigating and combat
Top-tier wings with great speed, acceleration, and flight time. Particularly effective for mages with extra buffs
Has instant acceleration and hover ability, offering great control and maneuverability, but slightly lower flight time than S-tier wings
Superior flight time and speed, plus the ability to fly underwater, making them very versatile for various situations
Decent flight stats with good maneuverability, though lacking the extra features of higher-tier wings
Offers good flight stats for mid-to-late game but doesnâ€™t compare to the stronger endgame wings
Fairly solid for its tier, offering decent speed and flight time, suitable for pre-hardmode progression
Easy to acquire in the early game and provides decent flight capabilities for the time they are available
Among the first wings you can craft, they offer basic flight ability but are quickly outclassed by later options
Similar to Angel Wings in performance, a beginner option with limited flight duration and speed
Mid-tier wings with very basic stats, useful for earlier stages but not viable later in the game
